how do i check cd's md5?
there's a file md5sum.txt in the CD's root
go to that directory, and type 'md5sum -v -c md5sum.txt'
do you have a root password? did you enter one during install?
you can add yourself to the sudo list by doing something like 'EDITOR=gedit su -c visudo /etc/sudoers'
yeah, you can do 'su -c aptitude' to, but ubuntu gnome admin apps (and most people here) will assume you have sudo setup
